nodes.text: Bright Suns Morning was a breakfast dish served at Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo in Batuu's Black Spire Outpost. It was made with three cheeses, eggs, sausage, and potato, along with a small Mustafarian Lava Roll. A version for younglings called Bright Suns Youngling Breakfast was also available.

This dish is found in the real world Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo at Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. The menu's description originally read, "Three-cheese egg bite, pork sausage, purple potato hash, mini Mustafarian Lava Roll." Since its debut, the dish has been renamed to Bright Suns Breakfast Platter, the roll has been renamed to Mustafarian Cinnamon Roll, and breakfast is no longer served at the Disney's Hollywood Studios location.
